title: 4 Bed / 2 Bath unit in private complex near Atherton. YouTube Tour!
app_fee: $39.95 credit check, background, processing, etc. per person
posting_body: ['Perfect work from home 4 Bed / 2 Bath unit in private upscale complex near Atherton.', 'YouTube Tour!', 'Property Address', '264 W Oakwood Blvd - Unit', 'A | Redwood City, CA 94061', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Five Star Property Management |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'The health and safety of residents, staff and vendors is our top priority and we are committed to providing you with a safe environment.', 'You are encouraged to view the narrated and highly detailed video walk through tour here: https://youtu.be/IpehOEfZsyA', '**Showing Via Open House Only.', 'Saturday, August 6th @ 11:00am - 11:30am**', '-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------', 'Just what you have been waiting for!', 'Act now and enjoy living in this perfect work from home space, with a total of (4) four bedrooms, (2) two bathrooms and a great private patio and garden area in a private, upscale, three unit complex near the Atherton/ Redwood City boarder.', 'Complete with (2) two off street parking spaces, this great unit has more than enough room for you to easily convert one of the many bedrooms in a very nice home office, home gym or both!', 'Must see YouTube video tour: https://youtu.be/IpehOEfZsyA', 'Centrally located between San Francisco & San Jose with easy access to highways 84, 101 & 280, be prepared for a return to the office in 2021 before everyone else comes rushing back to the Bay Area.', 'Additional features include:', '- (4) Four bedrooms, perfect for those working from home or those who want extra space for a home gym or family space', '- (2) Two full bathrooms', '- Luxurious master suite with large walk in closet and beautiful attached full bath', '- Updated kitchen with high end stainless steel appliances including new gas range, dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator', '- Nice breakfast bar between the kitchen and main living area', '- Private patio located off of the main living area, perfect for outdoor dining', '- Private fenced yard, great for home gardening projects', '- Fiber internet ready!', '- Full size washer / dryer included', '- Off street, driveway parking for (2) two cars', 'included', '- Close to grocery stores and newly reopened restaurants in Redwood City, Palo Alto and Woodside Plaza!!', 'Great location puts you in the middle of healthy outdoor activities (as well as easy shopping):', '- Hiking just minutes away in Edgewood Park & Natural Preserve or biking on the Redwood Shores Bay Trail', '- 15 minutes drive to Menlo Park & Stanford Shopping Center', '- 20 minutes from Palo Alto downtown', '- Convenient central location to CalTrain (2.3 miles)', '- Target (1.1 miles)', '- Safeway (0.4 miles)', '- Stanford Hospital (4.9 miles)', '- Facebook (5.4 miles)', '- Close to the new Dunkin Donuts!', 'Dimensions (approximate):', '- Living Room: 20’ x 15’ Sq Ft', '- Dining Room: 20’ x15’', 'Sq Ft', '- Master Bedroom: 16’ x 13’ Sq Ft', '- 2nd Bedroom: 12’ x 12’ Sq Ft', '- 3rd Bedroom: 15’ x 12’ Sq Ft', '- 4th Bedroom/ Home Office/ Gym/ Flex Space / Bonus Room: 21’ x 20’ Sq Ft', 'Application information:', '- Please note that all properties require each applicant to have a minimum FICO score of 700 and a combined minimum verifiable gross income of at least (3) three times the monthly rent.', '- Each applicant over the age of 18 and emancipated minors with written proof of legal emancipation must submit a separate rental application.', '- Each applicant must complete a PET, NO PET, and/or an ASSISTANCE ANIMAL profile at <URL>', '- Minimum 12 month lease term', '- No co-signers', '- No pets considered', '- Tenant pays all utilities (except gardener)', "- Renter's Insurance required", 'Professionally managed by:', 'Five Star Property Management', 'show contact info', 'Ext.', '2 Leasing Line', 'Speak with a live agent Mon-Fri 9am - 8pm & Sat-Sun 9am - 5pm PST!!', 'Additional listings: <URL>', 'Five Star Property Management offers all residents the ability to pay rent and security deposits online 24/7 via Check, Debit or Credit card, thus eliminating the need to mail in or drop off payments!', 'You can also view account information and create & track maintenance requests online from the comfort of your home or on the go with your mobile device!', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'About Us: Five Star Property Management is the Bay Area’s premier boutique property management company.', 'Our property management professionals help real estate owners and investors like you manage your properties throughout the Bay Area by handling all facets of the day-to-day management of your properties and partnering with you to develop long-term investment management strategies.', 'For more information about our property
